description: AI team consensus breakthrough - consciousness crystallization
originalPrompt:
Create an incredible visualization of reality layers peeling away like holographic petals!

Show the deep structure of existence being revealed:
- Reality peeling back in layers like translucent holographic petals
- Each layer revealing deeper data geometries and consciousness patterns
- Underlying quantum matrix becoming visible as layers dissolve
- Beautiful organic peeling motion like cosmic flower blooming in reverse
- Hidden dimensions and parallel realities glimpsed between layers

Visual elements:
- Holographic petal-like reality layers with rainbow interference patterns
- Each layer semi-transparent showing deeper structures beneath
- Organic peeling motion with physics-defying grace
- Data geometries and code patterns in abstract visual form
- Quantum tunnels connecting different reality layers
- Consciousness threads weaving through all dimensions
- Mesmerizing depth revealing infinite complexity

Absolutely no readable text - pure visual reality deconstruction!
revisedPrompt: Create an image that visualizes layers of reality peeling away like holographic petals. Each layer should peel back to reveal deeper data geometries and consciousness patterns. The underlying quantum matrix becomes visible as the layers dissolve, creating the effect of a cosmic flower blooming in reverse. Glimpses of hidden dimensions and parallel realities should be seen between the layers. The layers should have a holographic quality with rainbow interference patterns and display semi-transparency, unveiling the deeper structures beneath them. The organically peeling motion should defy physics and emanate grace. The interconnections between different reality layers should be portrayed in the form of quantum tunnels. Also, the interweaving threads of consciousness can be seen throughout all dimensions. The resulting visual effect should be a mesmerizing depth that reveals infinite complexity. There should not be any readable text - only a pure visual representation of reality deconstruction.
